page.title: 20Official Buildings
page.content:
{OFFICIAL BUILDINGS {Civic Centre -}opened May 1965 {Health Centre -}opened October 1977 {Health Clinic -}opened January 1966 {Government Offices -}opened 1969 {Magistrates Court -}opened 1974 {Juvenile Court -}opened 1974 {Probation Offices -}opened 1974 This modern complex has become the administrative centre for the Borough of Blaenau Gwent.
Survey carried out by children and staff of Garnlydan Primary School,Ebbw Vale together with children and staff of St. Mary's Church in Wales School, Brynmawr.
